title: Assessment of Art Attributes (AAA)
description: The AAA is an instrument designed to assess six formal-perceptual and six conceptual-representational attributes using 24 paintings from the Western canon.

title: Assessment of Preference for Balance (APB)
description: Here, we introduce the assessment of preference for balance (APB) and report a method to derive an objective balance score.

title: Face Image Meta-Database (fIMDb)
description: The fIMDb provides detailed information about sources for face photographs intended for use in research.

sources.title: The fIMDB is available on the website of Cliff Workman, Ph.D.

title: ChatLab Facial Anomaly Database (CFAD)
description: The CFAD was developed to facilitate research on biases towards individuals with facial anomalies. The database allows searching by age, sex, ethnicity, pose, and type/etiology of anomaly. Retrieve original stimuli or view images at various stages of pre-processing, e.g., normalized to interpupillary distance.

sources.title: The CFAD is available on the website of Cliff Workman, Ph.D.

title: Cardillo Normed Metaphors
description: We provide 400 pairs of matched metaphoric and literal sentences. The set features metaphors of three types (nominal-entity, nominal-event, and predicate) and two modalities (sound, motion), and has been normed on 10+ psycholinguistic and theoretically-relevant properties (e.g. familiarity, interpretability, imageability, beauty).

title: Ratinginstrument für zweidimensionale bildnerische Arbeiten (RizbA)—Rating Instrument for Two-Dimensional Pictorial Work
description: The RizbA is a 26-item survey designed to evaluate pictorial expression, as theoretically defined by 7 content areas: representation, color, shape, space, motion, composition, expression. English translations for survey items are provided in the original publication, and an empirically-validated version of the translated survey is in development.

sources.title: Schoch, K., Gruber, H., Ostermann, T. (2017)
